main event: A round object with a fan-shaped tail was seen in bright daylight, followed by a sighting of a green fireball.
interesting points: The round object was greenish-purple with an orange tail and climbed straight up before falling like a stone., The sighting of the round object lasted 15 seconds., The green fireball was observed over a 10-minute period and approached within a few miles., The green fireball discarded red and green particles before burning out., Both sightings occurred in New Mexico.
sighted object: a round object with a fan-shaped tail and a green fireball
